com.core.adnsdk

Class RecyclerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
      • com.core.adnsdk.RecyclerAdapter

  • public class RecyclerAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
    RecyclerAdapter is used to create Banner, Card views for RecyclerView. Default renderer view type is AdViewType.CARD_VIDEO.

    It would not load another ad when current ad was watched by default, user could use AdPoolListener.onAdWatched(int) callback to notify SDK to load another ad when current ad was watched.

    Since:
    2016-03-15
